quote: Why can't we have those curves and arches that express feeling in design? What is wrong with them? Why has everything got to be vertical  straight  unbending  only at right angles - and functional?
quote_letters: WHY CANT WE HAVE THOSE CURVES AND ARCHES THAT EXPRESS FEELING IN DESIGN WHAT IS WRONG WITH THEM WHY HAS EVERYTHING GOT TO BE VERTICAL  STRAIGHT  UNBENDING  ONLY AT RIGHT ANGLES - AND FUNCTIONAL
